snippet.title: Dead Effect Official Trailer - Space Zombies everywhere!
snippet.description:
Fight off undeads in Dead Effect, available for FREE on:
- iOS: http://bit.ly/1d7jacM
- Android: http://bit.ly/194PbRt

JOIN OUR RANKS AND BECOME AN ELITE MEMBERS OF THE SECTION 13!

Fight against zombies in one of the most atmospheric space Sci-Fi FPS games available on iPad/iPhone. Welcome on board of the ESS Meridian.

You finally awake after 178 days of hibernation. But something is not right, and no one is around. 
Try to find out what is happening.

• Enjoy your fight again undead zombies in a campaign featuring an immersive storyline.
• Use your special ability to slow the time and defeat even toughest enemies!
• Discover the mysteries of the ESS meridian, its impressive environments and intense music.
• Survive in deadly arenas, until rescue module arrives.
• Search for enough money to buy and upgrade your weapons in the armory
• Improve your character abilities in the upgrade chambers.
• Enjoy all the mini-games.
• Optimized for newest devices and retina display.
• Outstanding customizable controls - You think it is not possible to play action and dynamic FPS on your iPhone or iPad, you are wrong!

Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Bulkypix/ 
Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Bulkypix
Add us on Google Plus: https://plus.google.com/+bulkypix/
Visit our website: http://www.bulkypix.com/
